\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1]
\node[](0)at(0,0.0)
{\scalebox{1}{0}};

\node[](1)at(-2.5,2.0)
{\scalebox{1}{00}};

\node[](2)at(-0.8333333333333335,2.0)
{\scalebox{1}{01}};

\node[](4)at(0.833333333333333,2.0)
{\scalebox{1}{10}};

\node[](6)at(2.5,2.0)
{\scalebox{1}{11}};

\node[](3)at(-2.5,4.0)
{\scalebox{1}{0*}};

\node[](5)at(-0.8333333333333335,4.0)
{\scalebox{1}{*0}};

\node[](7)at(0.833333333333333,4.0)
{\scalebox{1}{1*}};

\node[](8)at(2.5,4.0)
{\scalebox{1}{*1}};

\node[](9)at(0,6.0)
{\scalebox{1}{**}};

\draw(0.north)--(1.south);
\draw(0.north)--(2.south);
\draw(0.north)--(4.south);
\draw(0.north)--(6.south);
\draw(1.north)--(3.south);
\draw(1.north)--(5.south);
\draw(2.north)--(3.south);
\draw(2.north)--(8.south);
\draw(3.north)--(9.south);
\draw(4.north)--(5.south);
\draw(4.north)--(7.south);
\draw(5.north)--(9.south);
\draw(6.north)--(7.south);
\draw(6.north)--(8.south);
\draw(7.north)--(9.south);
\draw(8.north)--(9.south);
\end{tikzpicture}
